::DarkMouse::

She woke up laying on the floor in Scorponok's lab.  She sat up and  
looked around the lab.
"What the? How did I get here? And where is here?"
She got up and walked out of the lab and into the main room.
She looked around the main room and saw no one was around. "No one at 
home I guess."
She walked over to the console and stared at it with a quizzical look 
on her face.  "I wonder what this is."  She stared at the monitors 
and looked at the screens.  None of it made any sence to her.  She 
looked under the console and saw a cage with a small rat in it.  She 
knelt down and stuck her finger in the cage.  The rat, Akura, put 
it's paw on her finger.
"Your a friendly litte guy aren't you?"  She opened the cage and 
picked the rat up.  It ran up her shoulder and nuzzled against her 
neck.
"Hey, cut that out, those little whiskers of your's tickle." she said 
wit a slight chuckle and a smile.  She carried the rat with her to 
the entrance of the cave.  She looked about arounf the entrance and 
saw no one about.
"Hmm, this is very odd.  How is it that a whole group would leave a 
base like this unguarded?"  she shrugged her shoulders and looked 
around again.  No one was in sight at all.
"Well, If this place is deserted, I guess there is no reason for us 
to stay them." she held the rat in her hands and up to her 
face. "Wouldn't ou agree my little friend?" She smiled and put the 
rat back on her shoulder.
"Well, whick way to go from here?  I suppose that way is as good as 
any."  She started walking off into the forest with her rat on her 
shoulder.

She verntured a few miles and rested near a small stream.
"Things are looking up my little friend," she said to the rat," We 
have fresh water, and look, fish.  We shall have lunch in no time 
flat."
